title: Effect of decrease in money demand

content.question: With a constant money supply, if the demand for money decreases, the equilibrium interest rate and quantity of money will change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Interest Rate Quantity of Money Increase Decrease
Interest Rate Quantity of Money Increase Not change
Interest Rate Quantity of Money Decrease Decrease
Interest Rate Quantity of Money Decrease Increase
Interest Rate Quantity of Money Decrease Not change

content.answer: Interest Rate Quantity of Money Decrease Not change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
